Name: Super Auto Pets
About the game: Battle against other players at your own pace in this free to play chill auto battler. In Super Auto Pets you build a team from a lovable cast of animals who will fight for you. They each have unique abilites, so choose wisely who will join your team! Features two modes Arena mode, asynchronous match ups, no turn timer! Can you reach 10 medals? Versus mode, match up against X other players, can you come out on top? Please note that this is a beta release. Things are subject to change, and there might be some imbalance issues. Feel free to report any issues by sending us an email or joining our discord!
